headline: Synchrony Announces More Than $1.5 Million in Grants to Stamford Nonprofits, Joins Mayor Simmons to Celebrate Spring with Daffodil Blooms
summary: In a vibrant celebration of spring and community spirit, Synchrony (NYSE: SYF), a premier consumer financial services company headquartered in Stamford, together with Mayor Caroline Simmons, Stamford Downtown and Stamford Parks Community Partnership, today celebrated the blooming of hundreds of daffodils planted across Downtown Stamford through a contribution from Synchrony. The beautifying of the park and surrounding small businesses is part of the company's commitment to giving back to the cit

content.title: Synchrony Announces More Than $1.5 Million in Grants to Stamford Nonprofits, Joins Mayor Simmons to Celebrate Spring with Daffodil Blooms
content.summary: In a vibrant celebration of spring and community spirit, Synchrony (NYSE: SYF), a premier consumer financial services company headquartered in Stamford, together with Mayor Caroline Simmons, Stamford Downtown and Stamford Parks Community Partnership, today celebrated the blooming of hundreds of daffodils planted across Downtown Stamford through a contribution from Synchrony. The beautifying of the park and surrounding small businesses is part of the company's commitment to giving back to the cit

thumbnail.caption: Synchrony announces more than $1.5 Million in grants to Stamford nonprofits, joins Mayor Simmons, Stamford Parks Community Partnership, and Stamford Downtown to celebrate Spring with daffodil blooms.

headline: Synchrony Named No. 2 Best Company to Work For
summary: Celebrating its people-centric culture that expands access to credit for consumers and helps businesses thrive, Synchrony (NYSE: SYF) was named today by Fortune magazine and Great Place to Work速 as the number 2 Best Company to Work For速 in the U.S.
